item.title: THE OTHER CLUB on Pandemic Amnesty [The Other Club]
item.description:
The Other Club with Mike and Tim ~ June 21, 2023
On this episode of The Other Club, hosts Dr. Michael Thiessen and Tim Tysoe talk about pandemic amnesty and how to apply biblical principles of forgiveness to the COVID-19 situation in response to Christianity Today's calls for pandemic amnesty: https://www.christianitytoday.com/ct/2023/may-web-only/covid-19-pandemic-amnesty-masks-vaccine-lockdown-church.html.

Music: Sloan - Money City Maniacs.
Directed by Sloan and Mark Cutler From the album Navy Blues © 1998 Two Minutes For Music Ltd.

Episode Resources:
LET’S DECLARE A PANDEMIC AMNESTY | The Atlantic: https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2022/10/covid-response-forgiveness/671879/;
Trudeau Government knew about COVID jab side effects | Life Site News: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/secret-memo-shows-trudeau-govt-knew-about-covid-vaccine-injuries-and-strategized-to-allay-fears;
More than 100 children suffered COVID jab seizures | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/more-than-100-young-children-suffered-seizures-after-covid-vaccination-study_5321835.html;
Green monkey DNA found in COVID shots | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/health/green-monkey-dna-found-in-covid-19-shots_5317587.html?src_src=partner&src_cmp=goddeketal;
JAMA reported myocarditis incidents after COVID shots | JAMA Network: https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jama/fullarticle/2788346;
COVID jabs causing largest blood clots ever | Good Neighbour Group: https://goodneighbourgroup.substack.com/p/covid-injections-causing-largest?publication_id=1164913&post_id=127886137&isFreemail=true;
Pfizer funnelled $12 million to Anderson Cooper to promote jabs | The Peoples Voice: https://thepeoplesvoice.tv/pfizer-caught-funnelling-12-million-to-anderson-cooper-to-promote-mrna-jabs-to-americans;
Zuckerberg admits they censored true information: https://twitter.com/kanekoathegreat/status/1667011470406860803; 
Nurse about to be fired for not having a COVID jab | LFPress: https://lfpress.com/news/local-news/pregnant-london-nurse-whos-about-to-be-fired-why-is-covid-vaccine-still-mandatory;
